name: metaflowx
summary: A comprehensive, modular machine-learning framework that consolidates datasets, model architectures, optimization algorithms, preprocessing utilities, and evaluation tools into a unified toolkit designed for research, experimentation, and education. metaflowx streamlines end-to-end workflows—from data ingestion to model selection, training, tuning, and validation—empowering learners and researchers with a clean, extensible, and production-aware interface.
author: ml_lab
